channel.title: I Need some help with my server
channel.description:
Well, i made working dragon claws and the claws will attack with the 4 hit special. You can attack with the 4 hit special 3 times in a row. How do i fix it to 2 hits for the 4 hit special.
Another problem is you need your defense to be level 60 how do i change that to 60 attack?
My last problem is you can wear a shield with the claws how do i fix that so claws take up the shield?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2009, 07:02:17 am[/size][hr]bump

item.title: I Need some help with my server
item.dc:creator: @mitch352 mitch352

@mitch352 wrote:

jc, how do i make them 60 att where in wearing[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2009, 07:38:33 am[/size][hr]Well i got the claws working i know there 2 handed , and all i need now is to make them 60 attack
